Title: 27. Searching for clues
Text:
The plantation has been raided!
And that damned sentry was fast asleep!
I must look in close vicinity if they forgot something.

pages:
{"text":"I do not want to do it.

But we have no choice.
Take a few fighters and go raid that suger field.

I do not want to hear about any killing! So you better make sure nobody gets hurt in the process, understand?!"}
tag.author: Unknown
tag.title: Battle plan
